advanced_cache.description: advanced/debug setting: the path to the cache file containing already-downloaded filenames
advanced_cache.title: cache file

advanced_duplicates.description: advanced/debug setting: set this to true to disable duplicate detection
advanced_duplicates.title: duplicate downloads

advanced_threads.description: advanced/debug setting: number of threads to use for filtering and downloading.  set to 1 to disable multithreading
advanced_threads.title: thread count

blacklist_file.description: blacklist file to use when downloading
blacklist_file.title: blacklist path

blacklist_ignored.description: when set to true, all blacklist functionality is disabled
blacklist_ignored.title: disable blacklist functionality

download_dir.description: all files downloaded will be placed in this folder
download_dir.title: downloads folder

download_nameformat.description: this setting describes how downloaded files should be named
download_nameformat.title: name format for downloads

lastrun_date.description: this is the date that the program was last run.   posts older than this will not be downloaded. must match this format: YYYY-MM-DD
lastrun_date.title: last run date

lastrun_ignored.description: when set to true, all items will be downloaded regardless of upload date.
lastrun_ignored.title: ignore last run date

site.description: the site from which to download.  only e621 is supported at this point
site.title: download site

taglist_file.description: path to the file containing the list of terms to search for
taglist_file.title: taglist path
